The Johor‚ÄìSingapore Causeway (1,056 m) that links Woodlands (Singapore üá∏üá¨, rightwards) to Johor Bahru (Malaysia üá≤üáæ, leftwards) across the Straits of Johor. 
It serves as a road and rail link, as well as water piping into Singapore. 
Photo: Oct. 15, 2022. 
https://t.co/MLIKgcy4kO https://t.co/pHlihvOns5
